features: Easy and quick to assemble: There is no need to use additional tools for this bed rail for toddlers, and can fit any convertible crib, daybed, boxspring, or platform bed. This toddler bed rails can be used as long as it is placed under the mattress, without any modification to the daybed, convertible crib, flat or boxspring bed. When the baby sleeps, this crib rail guard for toddlers gives you peace of mind.

Strong and secure: Durable construction that provides years of reliable use. This bed rails for toddlers is made with strong steel construction with thickened metal pipe fittings and a secure locking system, so your little one can rest safely. And this baby & toddler bed rails & crib rail guard is reinforced sturdy safety system also. This toddler bed rails let you no longer worry about the fall safety of your baby when sleeping.

Correct Fit: This bed rail guard for toddlers are easily fold up and store away when not in use, or conveniently take it on the go. This side rail for toddler bed can be folded down at any time, which is very convenient for lifting or putting down your baby. The toddler rail for crib can be used as a crib rail guard. 32.3*20 inch foldable design for a range of mattress sizes including daybed, convertible cribs, boxsprings and platform beds.

Foldable design: This crib rail is 32.3*20 inch size, perfect for crib, and the reinforced sturdy safety system provides extra safety and security. The bed side rails for kids is foldable, can be folded down to the bedside. Reinforced sturdy safety system for optimal protection for your little one.
Buy Worry-free: This toddler bed guard rail provides a one-year quality assurance. If you are not satisfied with this baby bed rail for any reason, we offer a money back guarantee.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why should you choose GRELEX bed rail? Mesh breathablematerialFolding designSimple and quickinstallTop quality materialBest size toprotect the baby We persistently improve product quality and provide greater safety protection for more families.

EASY INSTALLATION & CORRECT FITSTYLISH DESIGNSAFE·RAW MATERIALS Whatever bed guard rail you choose, you want to be sure it's rock-steady after it’s installed. A rail that’s installed improperly might as well not be there. That’s why we have a simple, straightforward installation process video uploaded to our website and a manual that comes with the package. Screws for the wooden base, and adjustable straps for box springs. No matter the bed type, our guard rail can be securely and reliably fastened to it. No need to worry about it becoming loose from an improper fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The side guard was easy to set up and use. I like the feature of being able to put the side down for easy if making bed and for looks when granddaughter is not sleeping. The side guard keeps her safe at nights with its full net material side. Item was as described and was shipped and arrived on time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this
reviews.reviewText: Based on reviews on Amazon, I thought this would be a great product. Ater wrestling with the assembly by myself for half an hour, we tested it. Even with the stabilizing parts, it *** will not** stop anything from falling off the bed. It's also very flimsy. It's a waste of time and money. I'm starting the return now. I sure hope they'll take them both back because now that it's assembled, one of the two I bought can't be unassembled.UPDATE: Since I bought two, and could not get the one apart, the seller offered to refund my money without my sending the rails back. The seller also asked us to send photos to show how the rails could be improved. I gave the seller a good review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I buy this toddler bed rail for my 3 years boy, he is a restless little guy, and with this, I can finally rest assured and have a good night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, lousy instructions.
reviews.reviewText: Now that we are bedsharing with our 9 month old we decided to get a bedrail (crawling now). This has been great and prevented many falls however, the assembly instructions are terrible and out of order. We ended up tossing the instructions as it is pretty self explanatory on how to assemble this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It fits my little one's crib perfectly and this bed rail for toddlers is stable and study. Good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy bed rail
reviews.reviewText: Once I got it together I was happy with it but the instructions were not very good and cursed it a few times. What I had a problem with was you have to assemble the pieces after you put the cover over the pieces and the instructions were not very clear.Once I got it put together I was very happy with the the end result. It is very sturdy and the cover/netting is made very well and the material is thicker than other rails I have seen. The buttons that allow the rail to be lowered are easy to use and convenient when you don’t want the rail up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Se daño muy rapido
reviews.reviewText: Al principio funcionó bien, pero a los 3 meses se dañó y no asegura, así que mi hijo dormido se recostó sobre la baranda y se cayó
